title: The Guardianship of Linda Lopez
summary: Linda Lopez, a young superhero known for her mentoring abilities, discovers her power to manipulate time during a critical week of protecting her city from a mysterious threat.
summaryGerman: Linda Lopez, eine junge Superheldin, die für ihre Mentoring-Fähigkeiten bekannt ist, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, während einer entscheidenden Woche, in der sie ihre Stadt vor einer mysteriösen Bedrohung schützt, die Zeit zu manipulieren.
summaryDutch: Linda Lopez, een jonge superheldin bekend om haar mentoringvaardigheden, ontdekt haar vermogen om tijd te manipuleren tijdens een cruciale week waarin ze haar stad beschermt tegen een mysterieuze dreiging.
summaryFrench: Linda Lopez, une jeune superhéroïne connue pour ses capacités de mentorat, découvre son pouvoir de manipuler le temps pendant une semaine critique pour protéger sa ville contre une menace mystérieuse.

story.text: Linda starts her week with typical coaching sessions for young athletes. A sudden tremor interrupts as a strange time anomaly appears in the city park.
Investigating the anomaly, Linda unexpectedly finds herself able to slow down time, which helps her save a group of children from a collapsing tree.
Linda tests her new powers but struggles to control them. During a coaching session, time slips cause confusion among her athletes.
With help from a physicist friend, Linda learns more about her abilities and practices to better harness her time manipulation.
Her newfound control comes just in time as a villain emerges, threatening to plunge the city into perpetual darkness using a time distortion device.
In an intense battle, Linda uses her time powers to counteract the device, rescuing the city and learning that leadership involves timely intervention.
After her victory, Linda spends a peaceful day reflecting on how her powers can be used for more than just combat, perhaps even for better mentoring.

ending: Thus, Linda Lopez not only saved her city but also expanded the horizon of her contributions beyond the battlefield.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and sometimes, an even greater opportunity to mentor and lead.
